players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Charlie: "I'm not sure about Bob's claim; we should hear from Diana first."
Diana: "I don't know why Bob is accusing me out of nowhere. Maybe he's the mafioso trying to deflect suspicion from himself."
Diana: "I still think Bob is lying to protect himself. His accusation came out of nowhere—maybe he's the real mafioso."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and my investigation confirmed she is mafioso. We must vote her out now before she kills again."
Charlie: "I think Bob might be telling the truth; we should vote for Diana to be safe."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Charlie: "I'm not sure about Bob's claim; we should hear from Diana first."
You: "I don't know why Bob is accusing me out of nowhere. Maybe he's the mafioso trying to deflect suspicion from himself."
You: "I still think Bob is lying to protect himself. His accusation came out of nowhere—maybe he's the real mafioso."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and my investigation confirmed she is mafioso. We must vote her out now before she kills again."
